title: The Fog-Watcher's Lantern
description: The outer-perimeter signal lantern has gone dark during a thick Scourge-fog. Without it, the scout ships are blind.

turns.narrative: The fog is so thick you can't see your own hand. It's cold, damp, and smells of wet ash. The path to the signal tower is barely a shadow in the white.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You don't lose your way in the mist. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: Your inner sense of direction holds. (+100 XP)
turns.convergence: A 'Fog-Stalker'—a spindly, long-limbed shadow—darts past you in the mist.

turns.narrative: The tower looms up ahead, a jagged finger of stone. The stairs are slick with 'Fog-Condensate', which is as slippery as ice.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You make steady upward progress. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You reach the first landing before the fog can slow you. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The door to the lantern room is locked from the inside.

turns.narrative: You hear a scratching sound from behind the door. A weak voice is sobbing inside: 'The light... it wasn't enough...'
turns.consequence_a: Success: The hinges snap, and you burst in. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Lantern-Watcher is huddled in the corner, holding a shard of broken glass. The main lantern is shattered.

turns.narrative: The lantern used a 'Sol-Crystal' which has now been drained of its light. The room is filled with a small, localized vortex of fog.
turns.consequence_a: Success: He tells you the fog 'drank' the light. (+1 Lore)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find the 'Mana-Filter' is clogged with soot. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The fog-vortex begins to solidify into a 'Cloud-Wraith'.

turns.narrative: The Wraith is made of swirling vapors and two glowing, violet eyes. It's feeding on the remaining mana in the room.
turns.choice_a: Banish it with a 'Burst of Light'
turns.consequence_a: Success: The Wraith shrieks and dissolves. (+100 XP)
turns.choice_b: Trap it in a containment jar (Dex DC 14)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You have a miniature storm in a bottle. (+1 Loot)
turns.convergence: The room is clear, but you need a new light source immediately.

turns.narrative: A scout ship's horn sounds in the distance. They're heading straight for the 'Jagged-Ridge'. You have less than a minute.
turns.choice_a: Use your own weapon as a conduit
turns.consequence_a: Success: Your weapon glows with an intense, holy light. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You create a blinding, temporary signal. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The light cuts through the fog, painting the white world in a harsh, neon blue.

turns.narrative: The scout ship swerves just in time. You see its silhouette pass safely by the tower, its horn sounding a note of gratitude.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You keep the light steady until the fleet passes. (+1 Progress)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You restore the permanent light. (+1 Progress)
turns.convergence: The Scourge-fog begins to lift, retreating into the frozen wastes.

turns.narrative: The Watcher is beginning to recover. He thanks you and offers you his 'Fog-Glass' lens.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain a tool that can see through any mist. (+1 Gear)
turns.choice_b: Refuse and tell him to be more careful
turns.consequence_b: Success: He promises to double-check the filters. (+1 Rep)
turns.convergence: The sun begins to peek through the remaining clouds, illuminating the tower in gold.

turns.narrative: As you descend the tower, you find a 'Fog-Cutter'—a piece of the Cloud-Wraith that didn't dissolve. It's solid, cold, and hums with energy.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You gain a rare component for 'Anti-Fog' gear. (+1 Loot)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You return the energy to the wastes. (+1 Luck)
turns.convergence: The horizon is clear, and the settlement's scouts are safe.

turns.narrative: You look back at the tower. It stands as a lonely sentinel against the dark. The horizon is clear.
turns.consequence_a: Success: You bring news of the fleet's arrival. (+10 Morale)
turns.consequence_b: Success: You find a deep sense of peace. (+1 Luck)

conclusion: The Fog-Watcher's Lantern was a direct target of a Cloud-Wraith. The fleet is safe, and the beacon burns through the Scourge.

risk_matrix.penalty: Scout ship lost. -5 Local Resources and a week of mourning.
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Scout fleet reports signal lantern dark during fog

permanent_effects.settlement: Lantern restored; fleet safe; Fog-Watcher protocol reviewed
